flawed_nl_solution:
In 6 years, Jane will be 28+6 = <<28+6=34>>34 years old.
Dara will be half the age of Jane in 6 years, meaning she will be 34/2 = <<34/2=17>>17 years old in 6 years.
Currently, Dara is 17-6 = <<17-6=11>>11 years old.
Dara has to wait for 25-11 = <<25-11=12>>12 more years to reach the company's minimum age of employment.
#### 12

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 12. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
